MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:15pm to repair  faulty equipment on the underground network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50pm on the 30th November 2020.
